name: WordPress
description: Sync content to your self-hosted WordPress site using Application Passwords.
extendedDescription:
Sync Content to Your WordPress Site

WordPress powers over 40% of the web, offering flexibility, extensibility, and full control over your content. Whether you're running a personal blog or a large publication, WordPress gives you the tools to manage your content your way.

By integrating WordPress with Lydie, you can sync your documents directly to your self-hosted WordPress site. This enables features like automatic publishing, content updates, draft management, category assignment, tag support, and seamless integration with your WordPress theme and plugins. WordPress is open-source and free, with hosting options ranging from shared hosting to dedicated servers.

## Instructions

### Setting Up Application Passwords

WordPress uses Application Passwords for secure API access:

1. Log in to your WordPress admin dashboard
2. Go to Users → Profile (or Users → Your Profile)
3. Scroll down to "Application Passwords"
4. Enter a name for the application (e.g., "Lydie")
5. Click "Add New Application Password"
6. Copy the generated password (you'll only see it once)

### Connecting WordPress

1. Click "Connect WordPress" in Lydie
2. Enter your WordPress site URL (e.g., `https://yoursite.com`)
3. Enter your WordPress username
4. Paste the Application Password you created
5. Test the connection
6. Start syncing your documents

### Getting Started

1. Create an Application Password in WordPress (see above)
2. Connect your WordPress site in Lydie
3. Create or edit a document in Lydie
4. Connect it to your WordPress integration
5. Publish and your content will appear on your WordPress site

### Features

- **Self-Hosted Support**: Works with any self-hosted WordPress installation
- **Application Passwords**: Secure authentication without storing your main password
- **Content Sync**: Automatically sync documents as WordPress posts or pages
- **HTML Formatting**: Content is converted to HTML for WordPress
- **Update Support**: Automatically updates existing posts when republished
- **Full Control**: Manage your content through WordPress's familiar interface
